alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 14 at 9:50PM EDT until March 16 at 11:36PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at New Harmony affecting Gallatin, White, Posey, Gibson and Wabash Counties. .Minor flooding continues on the Wabash River at New Harmony. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage by Thursday evening. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue falling thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
